author: seelmann
msg: - Added a LinkWithEditor action to the browser view and changed action order in tool bar
- Improved history navigation of selected entries and searches

author: byersa
msg: A bunch of fixes to get the Content admin to upload and display the images under the "DataResource" tab.

author: agilliland
msg: Roller Planet application gets a facelift.
1. All the old planetroller stuff from the sandbox is either deleted or moved into the official apps/planet workspace
2. Planet now features a Struts2 based UI which replaces the JSF one.
3. Planet now features a dynamic rendering system based on the one used by Roller Weblogger.  Currently this is very limited, but it will be expanded fairly soon.
4. Planet now features a hashtable like properties table for managing application runtime properties.  Same as Weblogger.

author: mszefler
msg: Merged dev branch, allow setting of clustered property.

author: mszefler
msg: Minor rearrangement to allow easier overrides from custom modules.
